jabber.PubSubListener

type
class
available in
neko, js, flash, php, node
XEP-0060: Publish-Subscribe
Listens for incoming pubsub events from a given service.

Constructor

new(stream : Stream, service : String)

Instance Variables

stream(default,null) : Stream

Instance Methods

dispose() : Void

dynamic onConfig(service : String, config : { node : String, form : xmpp.DataForm}) : Void

Configuration got changed

dynamic onDelete(service : String, node : String) : Void

Node got deleted

dynamic onItems(service : String, items : xmpp.pubsub.Items) : Void

New pubsub item(s) recieved

dynamic onMessage(m : xmpp.Message) : Void

Every(!) full pubsub event message

dynamic onPurge(service : String, node : String) : Void

Node got purged

dynamic onSubscription(service : String, subscription : xmpp.pubsub.Subscription) : Void

Subscription action notification
